text: Wegberg is a town in the very west of Germany, in the state of North Rhine- Westphalia. It has 40 town subdivisions. == Geography == Wegberg is between MÃ¶nchengladbach and Erkelenz. Wegberg is in the Naturpark Maas-Schwalm-Nette, a nature and wildlife park. ==References== Category:Heinsberg Rural District
